issue.title: more more firehose issues: rotErr Error

content.raw: We've gotten the hose close to the spout in VRC Task 3 (it looks perfectly aligned when we examine in Gazebo), but have never successfully made a connection. We are still trying. I have someone working full-time on just trying different mating configurations. We'll post if we are successful.
